fields.name: enableReporting
fields.doc: Defines if the voltage reporting is enabled. Reporting includes measurement and delivery phases.

fields.name: panelCount
fields.doc: Defines the number of solar panels to be requested (from 1 to 6)

fields.name: samplingFrequency
fields.doc: Defines how frequently voltage report should be formed (in milliseconds). It means how often each solar panel will be requested for the level of the generated voltage.

fields.name: reportingFrequency
fields.doc: Defines how often voltage reports will be sent (the number of voltage reports).
